readable.title: 3373544964_c9f1253b7d
readable.content: A boy and his dog are standing on a trampoline , enjoying each others company . A boy looks at a dog while they stand on a trampoline outside . A buy with glasses petting his bulldog , on the pavement with woods in the background . A muscular dog with upturned face looking into eyes of a young boy . Dog with tongue out looking up at a young boy with glasses
